name: HYDROLOCUST (python virus source code)(.py)
description:
This is the source code for HYDROLOCUST. HYDROLOCUST is a virus I made in python about a month ago. It was one of my first projects. What This does: HYDROLOCUST is a harmless virus, it doesn't delete files, or do anything dangerous. It only opens a lot of tabs and windows, so many in fact it takes a few hours to move them out of the way. It also opens alert messages and sounds. HOW TO DEACTIVATE: There are two ways to stop HYDROLOCUST. 1. Press "command Tab" until you get to your python running system. 2. Or you can just restart your PC.

Hydrolocust does not do any long term damage, it can easily be removed and is supposed to be a joke virus.
